summary: Provides a Kubernetes plugin that constructs, launches, and monitors Metaflow step executions as Kubernetes jobs, handling pod specification, command assembly, label management, secret injection, environment configuration, and log collection through the Kubernetes API.
business_intent: Enables Metaflow users to execute dataâ€‘science workflows on Kubernetes clusters, integrating with Argo events and cloud secret stores to automate scalable, containerized step execution.
